Title: Makes provisions with respect to affordable housing within the city of Yonkers
Summary: Makes provisions with respect to affordable housing within the city of Yonkers; provides funds of twenty-five thousand dollars in the affordable housing development account for new construction of affordable housing within the city of Yonkers and acquisition of existing housing stock cooperatives, condominiums and fee simple multi-family housing where appropriate.
LawCode: Amd ยง1112, Priv Hous Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to affordable home ownership development contracts within the city of Yonkers
